gui.notes.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
tooltip.notes.date_format: The date format used in timestamps.
tooltip.notes.use_in_game_editor: Determines whether the in-game editor or the system's default text editor will be used to edit notes.
tooltip.notes.use_in_game_viewer: Determines whether the in-game viewer or the system's default text editor will be used to viewer notes.
tooltip.notes.pinned_note_position: The HUD position of a pinned note. Possible positions: top_left, top_right, center_left, center_right, bottom_left, bottom_right
tooltip.notes.pinned_width_scale: The maximum width of a pinned note relative to the screen's width.
tooltip.notes.pinned_height_scale: The maximum height of a pinned note relative to the screen's height.
tooltip.notes.wrap_note: Determines whether displayed notes will be word wrapped.
